Html: Hi, I am planning to design a program to parse the HTML file into XML format. I need to utilize the XmlDocument Class to implement this program. However, the Sharp Developer shows that the complier cannot find out the XmlDocument Class even if I "using" the HtmlAgilityPack namespace. Please do me a favor. Thanks.
XmlDocument isnt part of HtmlAgilityPack. It's included with System.Xml
